scripts.prod: npm run build-all-prod && port=8086 node broadcaster/dist/server.js
scripts.dev: npm run build-all-dev && port=8086 node broadcaster/dist/server.js
scripts.build-all-dev: rm -r broadcaster/dist && npm run build-server && npm run build-app-dev
scripts.build-all-prod: rm -r broadcaster/dist && npm run build-server && npm run build-app-prod
scripts.build-app-prod: (cd warzone-ui && ng build --prod) && mkdir broadcaster/dist/ui && cp -r warzone-ui/dist/* broadcaster/dist/ui
scripts.build-app-dev: (cd warzone-ui && ng build) && mkdir broadcaster/dist/ui && cp -r warzone-ui/dist/* broadcaster/dist/ui/
scripts.build-server: (cd broadcaster && tsc && cp package.json .greenlockrc dist/ && cp -r src/greenlock.d dist/)
scripts.build-image: npm run build-all-prod && docker build -t mikeshiner/brleagues-tracker:2.15 .
